nodes.text: Tranlang databases were devices that protocol droids used to aid in translating languages. In 34 ABY, C-3PO installed a new version of the TranLang product in himself, boosting his language count to over seven million.
The Tranlang database is mentioned in Jason Fry's young 2015 adult novel The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure.
